short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interactive 3D chessboard entirely built with web technology

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Main features
* Free!!
* Choose 10 degree of difficulty
* Undo actions 
* Load button to open portable game notation
* Save chess game as pgn format
* Languages available: English, Deutsch and Fran√ßais
* Promotion (chess rule): queen, rook, bishop and knight

Short instructions: check the chess icon on the top right corner of your browser Chrome to open game
